title: Was Ziggs here? Something...blew up on this page. Please give it another shot later.
body:
help me  
I was trying to register after this came

replies.body: I found the solution! On the link bar on top, change the na to your server (eg eune or euw) and then it takes you to the page.Worked for me!

ive spent my whole day to get a pbe account i download client i get to the part where u type your username and password.
so i go to this website. https://pbesignup.eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe .and i click i want to help and it says. Was Ziggs here? Something...blew up on this page. Please give it another shot later. and ive used all browsers ive got and still wont work.

This may have been due to a browser or extension problem preventing application submission. The first step I recommend here is running in Incognito to solve this.[ Cleaning your cache and cookies ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/RW7WQthM-was-ziggs-here-somethingblew-up-on-this-page-please-give-it-another-shot-later)as well as disabling extensions could help and get you to the right page. Hope that helps!
